description: This table stores procedure information received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PROC_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the unique reference ID.

columns.name: PROC_TYPE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the mapped procedure record ID for the external procedure.

columns.name: PROC_TYPE_TXT
columns.description: This item stores the free text name for the external procedure.

columns.name: PROC_PERF_AT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the facility record mapped location where the external procedure was performed.

columns.name: PROC_PERF_AT_TXT
columns.description: This item stores the free text location where the external procedure was performed.

columns.name: PROC_START_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the start date of the external procedure.

columns.name: PROC_END_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the end date of the external procedure.

columns.name: PROC_EVENT_ID
columns.description: This item holds the event identifier of the event information for the procedure.

columns.name: PROC_MASTER_REF_ID
columns.description: This item will be used to indicate duplicate procedure data.

columns.name: PROC_LST_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last update instant of the procedure in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

columns.name: PROC_UNSUCCESSFUL_FLG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether a procedure was an unsuccessful attempt


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unsuccessful Attempt


Documented on Wrong Patient

columns.name: PROC_UNSUCCESS_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant the procedure unsuccessful flag was set

columns.name: PROC_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the status code of a procedure when received from a document.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Other


Normal


Aborted


Active


Cancelled


Completed


Held


New


Suspended


Nullified


Obsolete

columns.name: PROC_DUP_INT_PROC_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the Order record of an internal charge that is a duplicate of this row in an external document record.

columns.name: PROC_DUP_INT_UCL_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the Universal Charge Lines record of an internal charge that is a duplicate of this row in an external document record.

columns.name: PROC_DUP_INT_TX_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the Accounts Receivable Transaction record of an internal charge that is a duplicate of this row in an external document record.

columns.name: PROC_DUP_INT_HOSP_TX_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the Hospital Permanent Transaction record of an internal charge that is a duplicate of this row in an external document record.

columns.name: PROC_FILTER_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason why an external procedure should be filtered from the composite record


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Claim Derivation: Procedure Code Inclusion/Exclusion List


Claim Derivation: Missing Provider


Claim Derivation: Sensitive Diagnosis


Claim Derivation: Missing Procedure Start Date


Claim Derivation: Excluded Procedure Modifier


Source Organization Unknown


Source Organization Mismatch


Source Organization Is Self


Clinical Note Type Exclusion List


Clinical Note Missing Service Instant


Clinical Note Missing Last Filed Instant


Clinical Note Missing Author Name


Dispense Cancellation


Same Day as Internal Encounter


Missing or Invalid Binary URL


Filtered or Missing Source Note


DocumentReference Status not Current


Claim Derivation: Excluded Linked Diagnoses


Claim Derivation: Missing Encounter Start Date
